criteria: All sandbox constraint unit tests passing; All RBAC integration tests passing; At-rest encryption confirmed via DB inspection.
success_metrics: Zero security regressions; All security requirements met.

criteria: E2E test for script preview happy path is passing; Manual testing confirms responsive three-pane layout; All structured error types are correctly displayed in the UI.
success_metrics: Preview feature is stable and user-friendly.

criteria: Automated performance benchmark test (REQ-PERF-DTR-002) is passing on the designated CI runner. All Prometheus metrics are verified via integration tests.
bypass_criteria: Documented performance deviation with an approved action plan for optimization.
success_metrics: NFRs for performance are met; System is observable.
